name: 2d BasketBall Hoops
description:
2D basketball game is a purely simple game for people of all ages, who want to understand the rudiments of a basketball game shootout.
How to play
2D basketball game comes in 3 modes; Normal, sliding and time challenge
Normal mode is like target practice where you can allow your imagination run wild by trying different angles as you aim for the basket.
Sliding mode entails more challenge and also more fun having mastered the normal phase. It is where you aim for a moving basket.
Time challenge mode is pushing you to achieve dunks within a stated time.
Features:
New balls are unlocked after maxing points
You can share your scores on social media with friends.
